text.value: Do you have a Quick Response (QR) code with your worker ID?
The worker ID must be a number between 0 and 999, 3 digits, and can't start with a zero. TZA: 1-300; MOZ: 301-600
Manually write your 3 digit worker ID here
Scan your worker ID Quick Response (QR) code
### Identification and demographic information of household and household head
1. Does the house you are visiting already has a painted Bohemia ID?
Household ID must be in this format ABC-123 (only capital letters followed by a '-' and 3 numbers).
1a. Write the 6-character household ID here (Include a dash in the middle, for example: ABC-123)
1b. Take a picture of the painted household ID
Do not go forward with data collection until the house has been assigned an ID and can be painted.
